feed.title: Manyfold Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.74.2
entry.content:
Using MySQL / MariaDB was broken out of the box; this release should fix the problems.

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix MySQL/MariaDB migrations by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2448
  • Fix MariaDB JSON fields by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2449

üåç Sustainability & Performance üåç

  • Optimize images by @imgbot in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2443

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.74.1...v0.74.2

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.75.0
entry.content:
Say hello to v.0.75.0 of Manyfold, in which we take our first steps into a larger world! We're excited to announce that we've added experimental early-stage support for ActivityPub, the decentralized social protocol that powers the Fediverse (think Threads, Mastodon, Pixelfed, Peertube, etc).

At the moment, only following and creating are supported for Models, Creators, and Collections, and only on your own instance - nothing federated actually works yet, but that's coming soon. This is just our first baby step. You probably won't notice much difference other than a follow button that doesn't actually do much!

Safety and privacy are always a priority, so of course, this is only enabled if you're running in multiuser mode, and there will be plenty of control over what's shared when cross-server federation becomes available; we aren't just going to open up your collections to the world without you being fully in control.

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Add infrastructure for social features with Federails by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2454
  • Allow users to follow models, creators, and collections by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2471

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix activity ordering in homepage feed by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2491
  • Fix frozen string problem in locale fallback by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2493
  • Ignore hidden files and folders during scan and upload by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2494
  • Fix LIKE query on PostgreSQL by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2500
  • Fix tag lists in bulk editing by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2501

üåç Sustainability & Performance üåç

  • Further improvements to tag performance by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2495

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Refactor list code to be more easily reusable by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2451
  • Move all model URLs out of /library/{id}/models to /models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2469
  • Create actors objects for existing users by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2470
  • Auto-create more Federails actors by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2483
  • Fix URL option settings by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2484
  • Add a stable env var for the rails app port by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2485
  • New activity feed on front page by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2476
  • Show all activities in feed by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2486
  • Move Create activity post into shared Followable concern by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2487
  • Make sure default activity user is an admin by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2489
  • Backfill last 20 creation activities on migration by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2490
  • Refactor local timeline generation by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2492

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.74.2...v0.75.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.75.1
entry.content:
Fix broken data migration in v0.75.0 - sorry about that!

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Reorder data migration to avoid error by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2503

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.75.0...v0.75.1

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.76.0
entry.content:
Mostly background changes in this release, heading towards more ActivityPub functionality. The main feed will now show updates as well as just create events, and you get a load of bugfixes too!

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Post and display update activities by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2509
  • Ignore Synology-generated files by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2553

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Remove temporarily-created models if ProcessUploadedFileJob fails by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2529
  • Don't link to users from activity feed by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2533
  • Hide user updates and fix local links in activity feed by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2535
  • Fix entity -> actor relationship by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2537
  • Fix error on untagged model listing by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2551
  • Fix some raw html appearing in text when translations are missing by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2552
  • Fix ignoring of library root folder by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2554
  • Handle non-existent actor in following check by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2555

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Remove Flipper for feature switching by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2507
  • Get Webfinger working for users, models, collections, and creators by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2508
  • Handle user signups in local feed by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2512
  • Set proper types for each actor by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2511
  • Don't repeat activities within 5 minutes by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2538
  • German translation updates by @mallo321123 by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2539
  • Polish translation updates by @XioR112 by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2540
  • Make create/update activity feed items translatable by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2541
  • i18n renormalization by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2542

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.75.1...v0.76.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.76.1
entry.content:
A few bugfixes for ActivityPub and database migration.

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Exclude followable objects from nodeinfo stats by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2558
  • Don't set standard ports in URL options by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2559
  • Exclude healthcheck endpoint from forced SSL by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2561
  • Include scheme in federails site host config by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2562
  • Remove foreign key before dropping index by @AevumDecessus in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2560
  • Create actor for default user if missing on create activities by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2564

New Contributors

  • @AevumDecessus made their first contribution in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2560

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.76.0...v0.76.1
